Dragonfly::

Dragonfly avoided the rockets and fired two missiles.

"Yield????"said with a bitter tone "I'm a predacon and predacons 
never quit!!!! what have you thought that I'm????... Or I'll come 
back to BlackFortress as winner or I'll die here as predacon..."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He tryed to jump back, but ten of the shots struck his chest, 
causing
> some damage. He looked at his enemy. Dragonfly could not fly do to 
the
> damaged wing, had a gimp leg, and had damage to the spark. It would 
not
> take long. He once again fired two rockets at his opponent.
> "Yield now, or die!"
